meanings.definition: Free from disease or infirmity; healthy.
meanings.sent1: She is the halest person in our family, always full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that she was the halest patient he had seen all week.
meanings.sent3: Even after a long hike, she remained the halest among us.
meanings.sent4: Her halest smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The halest fruits in the market were always the freshest and juiciest.
